Class ScoreAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.widget.BaseAdapter

        • org.buildmlearn.learnfrommap.adapter.ScoreAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.widget.Adapter, android.widget.Filterable, android.widget.ListAdapter, android.widget.SpinnerAdapter

    public class ScoreAdapter
extends android.widget.ArrayAdapter<UserAnsweredData>
    Adapter for the question displayed in a listview in score activity

    Abhishek
